MAN.TITLE: graph_sum

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : an other graph data structure, with same nodes
: graph data structure of the new graph sum.

DESCRIPTION.P: graph_sum creates a graph g2 with an adjacency matrix equal to the sum of the adjacency matrices of the two graphs g and g1. g and g1 are supposed to be simple graphs (use graph_simp before calling graph_complement if necessary) and to have the same number of nodes.
